items.sentence: Mary called him every name she could think of.
You have to cross the ocean to get to America.
You have to do it, whether you like it or not.
You know where to find me if you want to talk.
Tom and Mary weren\'t dancing with each other.
Tom asked Mary if she\'d like a cup of coffee.
There was a sign saying, "Keep off the grass."
There was an awkward silence when he appeared.
There were a lot of young couples in the park.
There were few students left in the classroom.
There were more than fifty girls at the party.
There were no railroads at that time in Japan.
Tom is working at this company now, isn\'t he?
Tom loved Mary, but she didn\'t love him back.
In case anything happens, call me immediately.
Is it true that Tom is dating a Japanese girl?
It took me an hour to learn the poem by heart.
We could have a problem if Tom shows up early.
We could hear the sound of people approaching.
Tom has made some very bad decisions recently.
